disputed.description: Pre-defined, executable rollback plans with clear triggers and ownership for the import workflow
Enforce exact provider version pinning (~> 5.x.y) for deterministic, reproducible TF plans
Procedural safeguards for terraform import: pre-import backups, mandatory diff reviews, post-import validation
DNSSEC activation playbook: registrar-aware operational sequence with monitoring and rollback
Define RPO/RTO targets for new stateful components (ElastiCache, DynamoDB, S3)
Align health check with statistical measures (real p99 over window, not single-probe)
Define ECS Exec network prerequisites (VPC endpoints for ssmmessages) explicitly
Feature flag safety guardrails: environment-specific defaults, CI linting for production flags
CI gate inspecting plan for replacement actions on prevent_destroy resources
Documentation consistency fix: file manifest sprint numbers vs deployment phases

blockers.concern: DNS cutover lacks dual-provider overlap strategy, staged NS rehearsal, and rollback TTL/negative-cache handling
blockers.why_matters: Failed NS migration can cause partial domain outage for hours due to resolver caching behavior
blockers.recommendation: Add formal cutover playbook with 72h TTL reduction, negative TTL check, multi-geo overlap validation, registrar rollback SLA, rehearsed rollback runbook

blockers.concern: KMS key policy grants root principal kms:* violating least privilege
blockers.why_matters: Overly permissive KMS policies allow unauthorized decryption, tampering, or key disablement
blockers.recommendation: Restrict key policy to explicit admin/service roles, remove blanket root kms:*, scope actions by principal tags

blockers.concern: Sensitive secret material (Redis auth token) generated and stored in Terraform state
blockers.why_matters: State leakage compromises Redis credentials enabling data exfiltration
blockers.recommendation: Use external secret provisioning (bootstrap script or rotation Lambda) so plaintext secrets never in state

blockers.concern: Health gate claims p99 SLO enforcement but only checks per-request latency, not real sliding-window p99
blockers.why_matters: False-positive deployment success can promote unhealthy builds to production
blockers.recommendation: Implement sliding-window p99 tracking, count 5xx over gate duration, or query CloudWatch ALB metrics
